#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stack>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<queue>  
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
#define PI 3.14159265359
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	double de;
	cin>>de;
	printf("%.10lf",cos(de/180*PI));
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
